title: Patch 5.5 - Cannot open league of legends at all..
body:
Guys, ever since the bard update came around.. i cant even open league.
The EULA comes up, i click accept and nothing happens.
I spam the launch button... and it does it again...
Anyone know wtf is going on?

:(

replies.body:
The first time I tried updating it failed. Second time worked perfectly.

Have you retried again? Maybe open League with admin privileges.
After clicking on the two EULA agreements (wait if u have to for the second one to come up), I clicked repair and somehow that got me through.
